summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 14 through 18, Block 7, University Park Addition; and the west one-half of Lot 20 and all of Lots 21 and 22, Block 32, Hill Tract Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-326 and 17-257, respectively.
